external.gw.api.validation

Interface ValidationIssue

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FieldValidation, GeneralValidation
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface ValidationIssue
    ValidationIssue wraps a validation message (the Reason property) along with its validation level and type (Error or Warning), and other data. It is created by calls to a reject...() method on a Validatable bean.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ValidationIssue.CONSTRUCT
      Deprecated. 
      Utility class for initializing an instance of external.gw.api.validation.ValidationIssue
